snippet: The project, Next, missed deadlines and had cost overruns, but also generated a lot of interest as a new way to distribute news. Instead, the company will focus on Reuters.com.
lead_paragraph: The project, Next, missed deadlines and had cost overruns, but also generated a lot of interest as a new way to distribute news. Instead, the company will focus on Reuters.com.

headline.main: Reuters Ends Plans for Ambitious Direct-to-Reader Service
